effect.scarlet_violet: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.the_teal_mask: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Negates held items for five turns.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.
